item.title: Trackmania with Openplanet on Steam Deck/Linux
item.description: Base Game Installation Download the Ubisoft Connect installer to your Downloads directory curl -o $HOME/Downloads/UbisoftConnectInstaller.exe -L https://ubi.li/4vxt9 Now we want to add the installer to steam: Click “Add a Game”, then “Add a Non-Steam game” in the bottom left of your steam library. Click “Browse” and find the installer we just downloaded. You will probably need to change the “Look in” directory at the top to something like /home/username in the dropdown.
